thread.title: 18-year-old woman identified in fatal shooting
thread.title_full: 18-year-old woman identified in fatal shooting - The Washington Post

author: washingtonpost blogs
title: 18-year-old woman identified in fatal shooting
text:
February 28 at 11:32 AM Follow @ByLynhBui Police have identified a woman who was fatally shot Saturday morning in Springdale as Shamica Briggs, 18.
Briggs was found with several gunshot wounds about 2:35 a.m. Feb. 25 in the 10000 block of Yellowwood Lane. Authorities pronounced her dead at the scene, according to Prince Georgeâ€™s County police.
Police are trying to determine a suspect and motive.
Officials said a reward of up to $25,000 is available in the case for information leading to an arrest and indictment. Anyone with information can call 1-866-411-TIPS and remain anonymous.
